Literature.Title: Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Anoplin and Its Activity on Bacterial Pneumonia in Mice.
Literature.Author: Gou S, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>=512 µM,Human glomerular mesangial cells (GMC):IC50=52.62 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µM)
